changeSet.author: Shawn
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}economic_bundle` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `space_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '空间唯一标识字符', `bundle_id` varchar(36) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '订阅组合包唯一标识', `base_plan_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '基础产品订阅计划', `start_date` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '开始时间', `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否活跃(0:否,1:是)', `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标记(0:否,1:是)', `created_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建用户', `updated_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后一次更新用户', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_space_id` (`space_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '空间ID索引' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='经济模块-订阅包表';

changeSet.author: Shawn
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}economic_subscription` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `bundle_id` varchar(36) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '订阅组合包唯一标识', `subscription_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '订阅ID', `plan_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '计划标识', `bundle_start_date` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '订阅组合包开始时间', `start_date` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '订阅开始时间', `charge_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收费周期日', `end_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订阅结束时间', `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标记(0:否,1:是)', `created_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建用户', `updated_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后一次更新用户', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_subscription_id` (`subscription_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '订阅ID唯一索引', KEY `idx_bundle_id` (`bundle_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '订阅包ID索引' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='经济模块-订阅表';
